div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1709 Tell Nebesheh (anc. Am), 50 km. (1088) E of El Mans√ªra, 1886 Burial: c. 130 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 11 AR. From excavations Ptolemy VI: 2 tetradr. (Citium as Svoronos 1478; Salamis as Sv. 1462) Ptolemy VIII: 9 tetradr. (2 Alexandreia as Sv. 1437, 1445; 4 Citium as Sv. 1582, 1598, 1600; 3 Salamis as Sv. 1540, 1543, 1547) Disposition: London 2 Petrie, Tanis, pp. 25-6 (BMC references)
